column1: #Text=Gun says : " Now , when you meet the queen make sure you bow low enough , that 's very important , and do n't look her in the eye , she ca n't stand that .
#Text=" Gun says : " Oh , you have no idea .
#Text=And I 'm the one who gets in trouble when people do n't follow them , so please , please for my sake try not to upset Her Majesty .
